markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Finishing Follow-Through](/Feats.aspx?ID=1524) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=321" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 89 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Finishing a foe maintains your swagger. You gain panache if your finisher brings the target to 0 HP (or brings the highest-level target to 0 HP, if your finisher attacks multiple targets).
name: Finishing Follow-Through
